import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import { FaUsers, FaStore, FaStar, FaUserShield, FaUserTag, FaChartLine } from 'react-icons/fa'; const AdminDashboard = () => { const [stats, setStats] = useState({ totalUsers: 0, totalStores: 0, totalRatings: 0, usersByRole: { admin: 0, store_owner: 0, user: 0 }, recentUsers: [], recentStores: [], topRatedStores: [] }); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [error, setError] = useState(null); const [filters, setFilters] = useState({ name: '', email: '', address: '', role: '' }); useEffect(() => { const fetchStats = async () => { try { const response = await axios.get('/api/admin/dashboard'); setStats(response.data); } catch (err) { console.error('Error fetching dashboard stats:', err); setError('Failed to load dashboard statistics'); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; fetchStats(); }, []); if (loading) return
Loading dashboard data...
; if (error) { return (
{error}
); } return (

Admin Dashboard

{/* Statistics Cards */}
Total Users

{stats.totalUsers}

View All Users →
Total Stores

{stats.totalStores}

View All Stores →
Total Ratings

{stats.totalRatings}

View All Ratings →
{/* User Role Distribution */}
User Role Distribution

{stats.usersByRole.admin || 0}

Administrators

{stats.usersByRole.store_owner || 0}

Store Owners

{stats.usersByRole.user || 0}

Regular Users
{/* Recent Activity */}
{/* Recent Users */}
Recent Users
View All
{stats.recentUsers && stats.recentUsers.length > 0 ? ( stats.recentUsers.map(user => (
{user.username}
{user.email}
{user.role === 'store_owner' ? 'Store Owner' : user.role === 'admin' ? 'Admin' : 'User'}
)) ) : (

No recent users

)}
{/* Recent Stores */}
Top Rated Stores
View All
{stats.topRatedStores && stats.topRatedStores.length > 0 ? ( stats.topRatedStores.map(store => (
{store.name}
{store.address}
{store.averageRating?.toFixed(1) || 'N/A'}
)) ) : (

No store ratings yet

)}
{/* Quick Links */}
Quick Actions
Add New User
Add New Store
Manage Users
Manage Stores
); }; export default AdminDashboard;
